content: यौतक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [युते विवाहकाले अधिगतं वुण्] Forming the rightful or exclusive property of any one, rightfully belonging to any one; विभागभावना ज्ञेया गृहक्षेत्रैश्च यौतकैः <ls>Y. 2. 149.</ls> --कं {@--1@} Private property in general. {@--2@} A woman's dowry, a woman's private property (given to her at marriage); मातुस्तु यौतकं यत्स्यात्कुमारीभाग एव सः <ls>Ms. 9. 131</ls>; also यौतुक in this sense.
